headline: Trump proposes ban on institutional home buying, sending real estate stocks down
summary: Investing.com -- Shares of major institutional landlords and asset managers tumbled Wednesday after President Donald Trump announced plans to "immediately" ban large corporations from purchasing single-family homes. The move, aimed at restoring the "American Dream" of homeownership for individuals, sent shockwaves through a real estate sector that has become increasingly dominated by Wall Street capital. The President’s Truth Social post triggered an immediate sell-off across firms with heavy ex
